Posted By: noobmag1 (1/30/2013 8:15:38 PM)
Rating:

@MattLynn
*Sigh* For the umpteenth time (or so I've seen today anyway), Rings only works on -activated- abilities, not -triggered- abilities.
Glissa's ability is an optional -triggered- ability that triggers whenever an opponent's creature hits the 'yard.

posts.post_content:
3/3, First Strike, Deathtouch for 3??? 5/5  
She's amazing even without her bonus ability; which is meaningless for me as I don't run many artifacts.   
I think there are only two possible reasons she's not rated 5/5;

2)Legendary; Running 4 is possible but not necessary.
